Metadata: Oregon State University Sea Grant College Program

The Ocean Law Memo is an aperiodic publication of the University of Oregon Ocean Resources Law Program (ORLP) and is distributed by the OSU Extension Service, Sea Grant Marine Advisory Program. at the University of Oregon Law School in Eugene, Oregon.
